title: Sign up in minutes
desc: Create your StudyMate account and choose your subjects, academic level, and learning preferences.

title: Get matched with study partners
desc: StudyMate analyzes your preferences to recommend suitable study partners with similar learning goals.

title: Collaborate & study together
desc: Chat, share notes, join study rooms, and collaborate in real time to enhance your learning experience.

title: Track your academic progress
desc: Set goals, track study hours, earn badges, and stay motivated throughout your learning journey.
